name: Ball Games⋆
description:
Ball Games is the best ball shooting idle game! Play ball!

If you like shooting games and arcade games, you'll love Ball Games!

Features of Ball Games:
- Shoot bricks with your balls
- Complete waves to get money that lets you get huge upgrades!
- More balls, faster balls, stronger balls!
- Try to clear as many lines as possible
- Level up by playing Ball Games every day!

Ball Games is a top arcade game played around the world. Play Ball Games by Block Puzzle Games every day!
